Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 8th overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 1982...
Injured on 5/12/1983 with a Spasms Back, out for 3 weeks...
Injured on 5/29/1984 with a Blister On Finger, out for 6 days...
Earned first career win on 4/16/1985...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/1986, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/1986, going 4-2, 1.28...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1987, going 6-0, 0.86...
Injured on 4/9/1988 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 6/3/1989 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Los Angeles on 7/14/1989 (Going to LA: P J. Key. Going to PIT: C J. Lopez)...
Injured on 7/29/1989 with a Strained Bicep Muscle, out for 6-7 weeks...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/12/1991 to a 5-year deal worth $8,500,000 per year...
Released by Philadelphia on 2/20/1991...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 3/2/1991 to a 1-year deal worth $1,796,000 per year...
Injured on 8/3/1991 with a Pulled Tricep Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Traded from Los Angeles to Chicago (N) on 1/31/1993 (Going to LA: P R. Beltran, SS L. Collier, 3B J. Macias. Going to CHC: P J. Key, CF B. Jackson)...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Los Angeles on 1/31/1993 (Going to LA: P J. Key, CF B. Jackson. Going to CHC: P R. Beltran, SS L. Collier, 3B J. Macias)...
Traded from Los Angeles to Chicago (N) on 3/2/1993 (Going to LA: P R. Beltran, SS L. Collier, 3B J. Macias. Going to CHC: P J. Key, CF B. Jackson)...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Detroit on 1/31/1994 (Going to CHC: P A. Sele. Going to DET: P J. Key)...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/1994, going 5-1, 1.50...
Was selected to the 1994 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/8/1994, winning 2 games with a 1.00 ERA...
